title: Which is the most developed country in building technology in Africa? - Quora

response.answer_text: Africa does not need any developed country to build its technology. Technology is available on the market to be purchased for use by Africa. The only thing that Africa needs is to educate its young men and women to be able to use the technology.Africa has to impart skills to its teaming unemployed youth to make them employable both in Africa and outside Africa.
